source.sqlReaderQuery:
-- CREATE TABLE etl.BlobStorageWatermarks
-- (
--     ID smallint NOT NULL IDENTITY(1,1) CONSTRAINT PK_etl_BlobStorageWatermarks_ID PRIMARY KEY
--     ,Path varchar(200) NOT NULL
--     ,Watermark datetime2(3) NOT NULL
--     ,NewWatermark datetime2(3)
-- );

UPDATE etl.BlobStorageWatermarks
SET NewWatermark = SYSUTCDATETIME()
WHERE Path = '/online';

SELECT
        Watermark
        ,NewWatermark
FROM etl.BlobStorageWatermarks
WHERE
        Path = '/online';

UPDATE etl.Watermarks
SET NewWatermark = (SELECT MAX(TransactionDt) FROM dbo.Tickets)
WHERE
        SchemaName = 'dbo'
        AND TableName = 'Tickets';

SELECT
        SchemaName
        ,TableName
        ,Watermark
        ,NewWatermark
FROM etl.Watermarks;

sqlReaderQuery.value:
DECLARE @@NewWatermark datetime2(0) = '@{formatDateTime(activity('ACT_GEN_LKP_GetWatermarks').output.firstRow.NewWatermark, 'yyyyMMdd HH:mm:ss')}'
        ,@@Watermark datetime2(0) = '@{formatDateTime(activity('ACT_GEN_LKP_GetWatermarks').output.firstRow.Watermark, 'yyyyMMdd HH:mm:ss')}';

SELECT
        CinemaCode
        ,CinemaName
        ,MovieId
        ,TicketCount
        ,TicketPrice
        ,TransactionId
        ,TransactionDt
FROM dbo.Tickets
WHERE
        TransactionDt <= @@NewWatermark
        AND TransactionDt > @@Watermark;
